TopicTitle: How do you successfully end a flight without reverting?

Articles.Content:
I just completed my first flight in .22 career mode and can't figure out how to end the flight without reverting. How do you successfully end a flight?

Edited October 16, 2013 by Gristle
Once you land, go back to the space center and click the communications array. Then hit "recover" on the appropriate spacecraft.
You can do it from the observatory/space center, or if you have landed, put your mouse over the altitude reading at the top of the screen.
